title: Windy Balloon
summaries: The Windy Balloon is a unique flying enemy that only spawns during a Windy Day event at daytime. It can be seen carrying Slimes which are bound to the string underneath.

While the Windy Balloon itself does not deal damage, the slimes attached to it will, both while flying and after the balloon is popped. The balloon will pop if the player hits it, gets too close, or when it reaches the ground, and will then always drop the slime to the ground.
The types of slimes that can be attached to the balloon are Green, Blue and Purple Slimes, with a rare chance of a Pinky.
